title: What is up with the new format of the star news webpage?  Its terrible.
text:
We're sorry you don't like our web format. It's built and updated
by a company based out of Florida, and we're locked into it for the
time being. However, we are always open to suggestions by readers on
how to make it easier to navigate. Please send your comments to our
web director Joel Axon at joel.axon@starnewsonline.com and he will do
his best to try to make the pages better. Thanks
